Title: Senior Data Scientist (Analytics), Consumer
Description:
Job Description

About the Consumer Group

As the name Consumer Group implies, this group is responsible for building and developing Wolt’s consumer-facing products. The core mission is to master the user experience while scaling up the platform to enable delivering a mall in a pocket.

About The Consumer Data Science Team

Consumer Analytics team comprises a cross-section of Data Scientists (Analytics) and Analytics Engineers. We work closely with the Data Engineering team who help ensure we have the right platform to deliver our insights at scale. We partner with Product, Engineering, Design and Operations teams to guide measurement and tactical decision-making using advanced analytics as we expand the Wolt platform across the globe.

About The Role

As a Data Scientist at Wolt, your role involves diving into our data to solve crucial business problems. The scope of this role ranges from diagnosing problem areas to identifying solutions to designing experiments and ultimately influencing decision-making. This is a rare, operational and actionable data-driven experience that requires a good mix of technical and stakeholder engagement skills. When you join this team, you will be driving action from the frontlines, rather than just doing yet another analytics or data science role. Data Scientists at Wolt take ownership of the business outcomes.

If you enjoy finding patterns amidst the chaos, are excited to build from 0 to 1, and have experience using data science skills to solve business problems, we're looking for someone like you.

Our offering to you


The online delivery platform that Wolt is building will offer you interesting and complex challenges together with the opportunities to create a big impact with your skills. Lots of geolocational and temporal data in real-time combined with differences in the economics and dynamics of the cities we operate in make Wolt both a challenging and so interesting company to practice analytics.
You can choose the location from our tech hubs Helsinki and Stockholm, or you can work entirely remotely anywhere in Finland and Sweden. You have the chance to decide the ways of working — a hybrid, at the office, or remote within the location above. 💙 Read more about our remote setup.
You would get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, we think big but stay humble, do right by people, we treat others kindly and justly, recognize that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement. Read more about how we work.


Our humble expectations


Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
4+ years of experience in a Data Analytics or Data Science position.
Expertise in statistical analysis, including hypothesis testing, experimentation using statistical software packages in Python, R, or equivalent for product development (preferably consumer-facing).
Proficiency in writing structured and efficient SQL queries for large data sets.
Have prior experience building intuitive data visualizations and dashboards that influence business decisions, utilizing tools like Looker, Tableau, Mixpanel, or similar.
Relentless pursuit of new ideas and data sources, and have the ability to systematically tackle ambiguous problems with a data-driven, hypothesis-based approach


Next Steps

The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!

The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.

For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Zhanna Filintseva (zhanna.filintseva@wolt.com)

About Wolt

Wolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Wolt is not just a delivery app – we’re a technology company building a commerce platform to seamlessly connect our millions of customers with thousands of merchant and courier partners, in real-time across 23 countries and 250+ cities. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest ratings, largely thanks to our customer-first-mindset, which shows in how we build products and run operations. In June 2022 we officially joined forces with DoorDash. Combined, we have a presence in 27 countries, 23 of which operate with the Wolt brand and app. Wolt and DoorDash continue largely independently, with Wolt’s name, brand, product, technology and team.

Working in Product Development at Wolt

At Wolt, we’re about getting things done. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.

The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 400+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 40 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.

Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

We want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.

Join us today to build Wolt together!

Title: Data Scientist - AI and Analytics
Description:
Are you able to transform raw data into valuable insights and have a strong business understanding? Then this is an excellent opportunity to join our AI team at the Stockholm office.




About the role

As a Data Scientist, you will develop our AI and analytics business by collaborating with internal and external stakeholders, identifying new business opportunities and find innovative solutions to complex problems.




You will be exploring, planning, and building solutions for internal cross-functional teams and clients. We strongly believe in being part of the client’s team and daily operations to be able to make the biggest impact possible. Common use cases include applying models for clustering, classification and regression.




Your background

Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience
Plus three years of experience in AI/ML
Extensive experience in Python programming and SQL
Experience with machine learning frameworks (e.g. TensorFlow and PyTorch) and deep learning techniques.




It’s a plus if you also have…

Experience working with and managing stakeholders in complex projects. Preferably as a consultant.
Have at least one certificate for GCP or Azure at professional l
Experience of Marketing Mix Modeling, predictive CLV and audience segmentation
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills




What we offer

We have an exciting future planned for NoA Connect and strive to develop our brand together with our colleagues and the rest of the NoA-family. Our client list covers a broad variety of industries including fashion & beauty retail, telecom, food, communication, and banking. Examples of customers are Telia, SAS, Telia, Strawberry, Länsförsäkringar, Adidas and ACO.

The opportunity to develop your know-how, discuss customer needs, trends, and share knowledge with colleagues.
The possibility to combine working from home, the office and at client’s offices.
Respect for the personal situation and a healthy work/life balance
Great benefits such as pension contribution, wellness allowance and 30 days of paid vacation.
... and much more.




Our recruitment process

No need for a personal letter or a CV-document. Just provide a link to your LinkedIn profile and answer a few initial questions - that's it. If you move forward to the next stage, we will use recruitment tests to ensure a fair selection based on your readiness for the role and your potential to grow with us.




To help us place the right people in the right role, we believe in science-based and fair assessment methods. Therefore, as part of our recruitment process, we use Alva Labs assessments to help us increase our hiring success by identifying the candidates that are most likely to thrive and be successful in the role.




About NoA Connect

NoA Connect is a data-driven marketing consultancy that unlocks growth by supporting marketing departments as they transition to deliver better brand experiences. Our objective is to enable our clients to reach their full digital potential and maximize their capabilities. To do so, our teams of experts, located in Stockholm, Copenhagen, and Oslo, improve all aspects of our clients digital activities by understanding their process, both in terms of strategy as well as execution and measurement. We have a great scope of competence not only within NoA Connect but also in our other agencies that enables close work and dialog with, for example, Developers.




We handle applications on an ongoing basis.

Title: Data Scientist, Merchant
Description:
Job Description

About Merchant Group at Wolt

Wolt as a platform focuses on serving three main groups: customers, couriers, and merchants. In a nutshell, the Merchant Group strives to make Wolt an integral part of our Merchant’s daily business. Their core mission is to provide merchants with self-service tools and automation that are useful, efficient, reliable, and delightful to use.

About The Merchant Analytics Team

Merchant Analytics is an embedded analytics function within the Merchant Group. The team works to unlock insights related to the marketplace and turn them into actionable recommendations that drive the success of merchants at Wolt. While keeping merchants at heart, the analytics team focuses on all kinds of analytics projects that can benefit merchants while ensuring a seamless consumer experience and also supporting Wolt’s marketplace strategy.

About The Role

As a Data Scientist at Wolt, your role involves diving into our data to solve crucial business problems. The scope of this role ranges from diagnosing problem areas to identifying solutions to designing experiments and ultimately influencing decision-making. This is a rare, operational, and actionable data-driven experience. When you join this team, you will be driving action from the frontlines, rather than just doing yet another analytics role.

Our offering to you


The online delivery platform that Wolt is building will offer you interesting and complex challenges together with the opportunities to create a big impact with your skills. Lots of geolocational and temporal data in real-time combined with differences in the economics and dynamics of the cities we operate in make Wolt both a challenging and so interesting company to practice analytics.
You can choose the location from our tech hubs Helsinki, Berlin and Stockholm, or you can work entirely remotely anywhere in Finland, Germany, Sweden and Estonia. You have the chance to decide the ways of working — a hybrid, at the office, or remote within the location above. 💙 Read more about our remote setup.
You would get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, we think big but stay humble, do right by people, we treat others kindly and justly, recognize that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement. Read more about how we work.


Our humble expectations


Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.
4+ years of experience in an analytics or data science position within an industry or research setting.
Expertise in statistical analysis, including hypothesis testing, experimentation and causal inference using statistical software packages in Python, R, or equivalent.
Proficiency in writing structured and efficient SQL queries for large data sets.
Have prior experience building intuitive data visualizations and dashboards that influence business decisions, utilizing tools like Tableau, Mixpanel, Looker, or similar.
Relentless pursuit of new ideas and data sources, and have the ability to systematically tackle ambiguous problems with a data-driven, hypothesis-based approach.


Next Steps

The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!

The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.

For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Zhanna Filintseva (zhanna.filintseva@wolt.com)

Wolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Wolt is not just a delivery app – we’re a technology company building a commerce platform to seamlessly connect our millions of customers with thousands of merchant and courier partners, in real-time across 23 countries and 250+ cities. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest ratings, largely thanks to our customer-first-mindset, which shows in how we build products and run operations. In June 2022 we officially joined forces with DoorDash. Combined, we have a presence in 27 countries, 23 of which operate with the Wolt brand and app. Wolt and DoorDash continue largely independently, with Wolt’s name, brand, product, technology and team.

Working in Product Development at Wolt

At Wolt, we’re about getting things done. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.

The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 400+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. Next Steps

The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!

The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.

For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Zhanna Filintseva (zhanna.filintseva@wolt.com)

About Wolt

Wolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Wolt is not just a delivery app – we’re a technology company building a commerce platform to seamlessly connect our millions of customers with thousands of merchant and courier partners, in real-time across 23 countries and 250+ cities. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest ratings, largely thanks to our customer-first-mindset, which shows in how we build products and run operations. In June 2022 we officially joined forces with DoorDash. Combined, we have a presence in 27 countries, 23 of which operate with the Wolt brand and app. Wolt and DoorDash continue largely independently, with Wolt’s name, brand, product, technology and team.

Working in Product Development at Wolt

At Wolt, we’re about getting things done. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.

The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 400+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 40 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.

Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

We want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.

Join us today to build Wolt together!

Title: Data Scientist (Consultant)
Description:
Come work with us

Netlight strives to be a truly diverse, equitable and inclusive organization. Regardless of who you are, what personality, background, and experience you have, you enrich our culture through your values. Netlight’s purpose is to unleash full potential, realize great careers, and fulfill personal growth. To achieve this, we have a highly engaged network organization, where every employee gets a mentor, delivery coach and personal communities. The key to our continued success is trust and personal responsibility, diverse experiences, challenging opportunities and developing from personal values. Every Netlighter is an active part of building and shaping this culture, which leads to a clear correlation between personal growth and the growth of Netlight.




About us

Netlight provides a full range of premium IT-consulting services at the forefront of the digital industry and stands out for its product- and technology-independent expertise in a wide range of industries and clients. We are a network organization of more than 2 000 role models making aspiring digital leaders successful in their business-critical IT projects. Netlight has been awarded several times as top employer, as well as for growth, continued profitability and engagement for diversity, equity and equality within the IT industry. Today we are growing all across Europe, currently with more than 10 active international offices.




What does it mean to be a Data Scientist Consultant at Netlight?

It will vary a lot between Netlighters as we, around the right person, will design a role together with you. You will be starting somewhere familiar with your experience, and from there it is your call how your career at Netlight will look, ranging from which clients you will work with, what role you want to take (based on your personal experience, strengths, your personal interest) and how your relationship with your mentor/coach/EDGE networks/social networks will look like.




As a consultant at Netlight, you will build the products, systems and technical solutions of today and tomorrow. This means that our consultants get the opportunity to help build and scale existing and new products and companies and also continuously learn and master a variety of technical tools. At Netlight, we will challenge you. Our clients will challenge you. You will challenge our clients. You will challenge us. We will grow together and unleash the potential in each other.




As a Data Scientist Consultant, you will help our clients in projects with roles in Data Science. It can be working within Data Science, Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, or project management in terms of working with data or utilizing data to make product decisions to mention a few examples.




Minimum Qualifications

Master Degree in Engineering or Technology
Verbal and written fluency in English
0,5-5 years of work experience within the data science field related to IT and software products in agile teams




Application

We are always looking for new Netlighters, so feel free to apply if you meet the qualifications.




We will get in touch within two weeks if we find that your profile and experiences are a match beyond the qualifications at this time.

Title: Data Scientist - Acceleration Nordics
Description:
Welcome to join an experienced and growing team of Data scientists and Consultants who work to drive increased marketing effectiveness for some of Sweden's and the world's largest brands.

As part of the leading media agency group GroupM, we at Acceleration work to transform large amounts of data into solutions to complex problems in media and marketing. The projects include a broad mix of econometrics, media buying algorithms, dashboards and strategy projects/consulting services.

Acceleration drives GroupM and the rest of the industry forward through technology and data innovation and works closely with the largest advertisers, publishers and technology companies in the industry. This is a position with a plethora of opportunities for growth both professionally and personally.

About The Position

The position includes working in a team with experienced colleagues:


Be a driven data scientist for projects in econometrics, attribution, experiments, algorithms and other data science-related projects
Together with the rest of the project team, analyze, package and present to our customers
Participate in and drive development projects within automated reporting, algorithms and other data science commitments


Professional And Personal Qualifications

We are a team with entrepreneurial drive. Professionally, we believe that you are a recent graduate or have worked for a number of years in data science or analysis with the following skills:


Education with a solid foundation in mathematics and statistics (e.g. MSc in mathematics, industrial economics, alternatively economist or statistician)
Experience with PowerPoint
Experience in project management
Ability to present and communicate your results in a convincing manner
Knowledge of different Excel, R, PowerBI is an advantage (but not a requirement)
Knowledge of applications within Cloud environments is an advantage (but not a requirement)
Knowledge of the ecosystem for digital media and environments within, for example, Google Marketing Platform, Facebook and Xandr is an advantage (but not a requirement)


On a personal level, we believe you are interested in:


Present and communicate your results to relevant stakeholders
Drive dialogues and deliver projects in both Swedish and English
Work thoroughly, detail-oriented and independently (proactive and entrepreneurial)
Be a "team player" with a willingness to work both individually and in a team


Our offer

With us, you get the opportunity to work with many of Sweden's and the world's most ambitious brands, together with a team that is passionate about digital marketing, and with market-leading technologies.

You will sit in central premises on Birger Jarlsgatan with inspiring colleagues from different backgrounds, who together drive digital marketing to the next level through innovation and solid work. Furthermore, there are great opportunities for personal development and career development within GroupM Sweden, as well as within our global network.

We are part of WPP, a large international group, and we work to combine the best of these two worlds. You are offered to work in a stimulating and developing workplace with a high comfort factor and colleagues who are close to laughing.

In addition to the obvious, such as good working conditions, pleasant working environment and exciting challenges, there are a couple of things that make working here a little extra good:


Great participation and opportunity to be involved and influence your daily work
Family spirit, short decision-making paths and great closeness between management and employees
We think that a balance between work, leisure and personal development is important
Wellness allowance of SEK 3,000/year and several attractive staff benefits
We offer market-adapted pension terms and private pension advice via our partner Nordea
We have occupational health care via Feelgood and additional health insurance via Euro Accident
Conferences, kick-offs and other fun that we do together
Office centrally located in the middle of Stockholm city on Birger Jarlsgatan


Application

The position is a full-time permanent position with entry as soon as possible. We apply a six-month probationary period.

In addition to reviewing your resume and conducting interviews, we incorporate a testing phase in our hiring process. Selection and interviews take place continuously, so submit your application with CV and personal letter as soon as possible.

Contact

If you have questions about the position, you are welcome to contact Filip Stjernfeldt, Senior Data Scientist & Team Lead at filip.stjernfeldt@groupm.com. We do not accept applications via e-mail.

About GroupM

GroupM is one of Sweden's largest media agency groups and consists of Wavemaker, EssenceMediacom, Mindshare, Nexus and Acceleration. GroupM's primary goal is to create benefits for our clients through collaborations with the group's agencies. We do this, among other things, through economies of scale in trading, technology and data. We are part of WPP, which is one of the world's largest groups in marketing communications with over 190,000 employees on a global basis. GroupM Sweden has around 375 employees in Stockholm, Gothenburg, and Malmö.

Title: Senior Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
We are looking for a senior machine learning engineer or data scientist to take lead in some of Codon's projects and potentially help them develop into full-fledged products.




The ideal candidate would be proactive, good at communicating with clients, and care about delivering high-quality results. You should be comfortable leading small and nimble project teams.




We work in small teams and collaborate to solve fun and hard problems in many domains, such as life science, agriculture, public sector work, manufacturing, and fintech. Our customers range from startups with novel ideas on how to utilize data and AI to global enterprise organisations looking to be more innovative with their data.




Codon Consulting is a platform independent company that always try to stay ahead of the curve. We want to be on top of the latest developments in ML and AI including NLP, computer vision, and tabular data. The backbone of our tool kit includes Python, R, various databases and cloud service providers, PyTorch, Docker, FastAPI, Hugging Face, OpenAI, Langchain, Anthropic etc. If you want to apply for this position you should be anywhere from familiar to highly experienced with several of these from an ML Engineering perspective!




Our offices are located at Södermalm in Stockholm. As we are strong believers in teamwork, we would like you to work with us at the office a majority of the time. In exchange we offer regular after-works, kickoffs and retreats, as well as weekly Friday seminars and internal learning sessions.

Title: Senior Data Scientist, Learning
Description:
We are looking for an entrepreneurial and business minded senior data scientist to join the band to help explore and execute on learning as a new opportunity for Spotify. It is a phenomenal role for someone who wants to work on a truly 0 to 1 project and have an impact on the company's growth trajectory!

As a data scientist in this team you’d partner with the full cross-functional team to help with research, data modeling and data-informed decision making related to building the product and driving impact for users, creators and the business. This is a fantastic opportunity to join our fast-paced team where you’ll get the chance to wear multiple hats and contribute to the product research and business analytics efforts to help craft and execute the product roadmap.

What You Are


Help build out the insights foundations that will allow us to gather conclusive evidence on the trajectory and viability of learning as an opportunity for Spotify. This includes instrumentation all the way through to analysis as well as understanding the learning space from multiple angles such as user, UX, content, marketing, creator and business perspectives to help inform decision making.
Develop business intelligence-, growth model- and product metrics framework.
Perform analysis on large sets of internal data to extract practical insights that will help drive product, platform and business decisions.
Design and conduct A/B tests to generate insights and drive impact across the entire learning product.
Build dashboards, data pipelines, and recurring reporting results, empowering business and product decision making
Develop models which power on- and off-platform promotion of learning based content
Help develop interest graph and content demand models for the content powering ML recommendations for users
Communicate data-driven insights and recommendations to key partners
Work closely and embedded with cross-functional team including engineering, product, design and business decision makers


Where You'll Do


You believe that Spotify can truly create an impact in the learning space and have a point of view on that.
You care end to end about the product, the implementation, the design, the creators, the business, and you are ready to wear multiple hats to achieve your goals.
You have experience in a data science role in a related field and expertise in science, computer science, statistics, economics, mathematics, or similar quantitative subject area.
You have experience with business intelligence, product analytics and complex data-driven decision making.
You have broad experience performing analysis with large datasets and strong understanding of experimentation, statistics and machine learning for decision making.
You value cross-disciplinary work and understand how to match qualitative research with your quantitative analysis.
You take pride in your ability to identify and solve complex, unfamiliar problems, and present them to the rest of the team.
You have a growth mindset, are curious and not afraid to be experimental. You share your ideas and continuously improve yourself and the team around you.
You have excellent skills across the data science stack including Python, SQL and visualization tools (we primarily use Jupyter notebooks, BigQuery and Tableau)


Where You'll Be


The team is distributed across the CET region with most people located in Stockholm and London.


#JobSite-Main-DataResearchAndInsights

#JobSite-Sub-DataScience

#HireRight Sweden Package

Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Vi startade Signific för att kunna lösa världens mest spännande och utmanande problem. Det gör vi genom att hjälpa organisationer och team att samla in, strukturera upp och agera på insikter från stora mängder kvantitativ data. På så sätt lär de sig snabbare om hur nytta, förändring och effekt skapas. 




Som Machine learning-konsult på Signific hjälper du våra uppdragsgivare att ta sin data till nya, datadrivna nivåer. Din förståelse för både affärs- och datamodeller kombinerat med analys och kod är superviktig för ett datadrivet, lärande arbetssätt. På Signific får du använda dina skills på stora, inspirerande problem.




Utöver att göra skillnad i dina uppdrag är du en stor del av ett framåtlutat bolag som sätter våra anställda i fokus. Vi är ett litet, flexibelt bolag med stora ambitioner och vill ha med dig på resan dit.




Vad du kommer få göra

Vi tror på en öppen approach till lösningar på våra kunders utmaningar. Vi väljer lösning efter problem och inte vice versa. Din roll kan därför variera beroende på ditt intresse och kundernas problem. 




Som ML Engineer hos oss ser vi dig troligen göra några av följande saker:




Först och främst hjälpa företag skapa mer nytta av sin data
Ta komplex data till modeller och analyser som löser viktiga verksamhets- och samhällsproblem
Designa, bygga och förfina machine learning i produktion för spännande kunder
Ta fram modeller för stora mängder användardata för att driva produkt- och designbeslut
Ha en nyckelroll att förflytta team och organisationer mot ett datadrivet arbetssätt.
Få ta del av och bidra till kunskapsdelning och nyskapande kultur ihop med dina kollegor
Utvecklas åt det håll du vill




Vem vi tror du är

Vi tror på att bygga ett bolag av olika personer som på olika sätt bidrar till att vi alla trivs och lyckas. För att du ska trivas hos oss och i din roll tror vi dock att det finns några saker som du checkar av merparten av:




Som person

Ser positivt på utmaningar 
Gillar att vara självgående men också att samarbeta
Nyfiken på nya teknologier och problem
Vill vara så bra som möjligt på det du gör
Gillar att bidra till kulturen bland dina kollegor och/eller kunskapsdela 




I din roll

Är genuint intresserad av att lösa kunders verksamhetsproblem
Har minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom rollen eller liknande roller
Känner dig riktigt bekväm inom minst ett programmeringsspråk (t.ex. Scala, Python/Pandas eller R)
Har erfarenhet och intresse för att produktionsätta ML-algoritmer
Förstår vilka mått och mätetal som är viktiga för digitala produkter
Gillar och förstår statistik (som t.ex. A/B-tester, signfikanstester och regressionsmodellering)
Noggrann men också lösningsorienterad
Trivs att jobba i agila team och kanske också i en mer ledande roll.
Har stort intresse för Data Engineering/Science/Analytics i allmänhet
Högskoleutbildning är inget krav, men konkret arbetslivserfarenhet är det.




En spännande resa där du får vara med och påverka

Vi är ett nystartat litet bolag, med ambitioner att göra stort avtryck i våra uppdrag och på längre sikt. Vi vill skapa en samling av dom bästa inom vår nisch och bygga en stark kultur av gemenskap, ambition och kunskap. Något som gör en signifikant skillnad helt enkelt.




Hos oss får du

Utmanande uppdrag inom områden du är intresserad av
Kollegor som ser möjligheter och värdet med din kunskap inom data
Vassa kollegor som gillar att lära och läras av varandra
Konkurrenskraftiga förmåner
Inkluderande och hållbar arbetsmiljö
Show more

  • Designa, bygga och förfina machine learning i produktion för spännande kunder
  • Ta fram modeller för stora mängder användardata för att driva produkt- och designbeslut
  • Ha en nyckelroll att förflytta team och organisationer mot ett datadrivet arbetssätt.
  • Få ta del av och bidra till kunskapsdelning och nyskapande kultur ihop med dina kollegor
  • Utvecklas åt det håll du vill


Vem vi tror du är

Vi tror på att bygga ett bolag av olika personer som på olika sätt bidrar till att vi alla trivs och lyckas. För att du ska trivas hos oss och i din roll tror vi dock att det finns några saker som du checkar av merparten av:


Som person

  • Ser positivt på utmaningar 
  • Gillar att vara självgående men också att samarbeta
  • Nyfiken på nya teknologier och problem
  • Vill vara så bra som möjligt på det du gör
  • Gillar att bidra till kulturen bland dina kollegor och/eller kunskapsdela 


I din roll

  • Är genuint intresserad av att lösa kunders verksamhetsproblem
  • Har minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom rollen eller liknande roller
  • Känner dig riktigt bekväm inom minst ett programmeringsspråk (t.ex. Scala, Python/Pandas eller R)
  • Har erfarenhet och intresse för att produktionsätta ML-algoritmer
  • Förstår vilka mått och mätetal som är viktiga för digitala produkter
  • Gillar och förstår statistik (som t.ex. A/B-tester, signfikanstester och regressionsmodellering)
  • Noggrann men också lösningsorienterad
  • Trivs att jobba i agila team och kanske också i en mer ledande roll.
  • Har stort intresse för Data Engineering/Science/Analytics i allmänhet
  • Högskoleutbildning är inget krav, men konkret arbetslivserfarenhet är det.


En spännande resa där du får vara med och påverka

Vi är ett nystartat litet bolag, med ambitioner att göra stort avtryck i våra uppdrag och på längre sikt. Vi vill skapa en samling av dom bästa inom vår nisch och bygga en stark kultur av gemenskap, ambition och kunskap. Något som gör en signifikant skillnad helt enkelt.


Hos oss får du

  • Utmanande uppdrag inom områden du är intresserad av
  • Kollegor som ser möjligheter och värdet med din kunskap inom data
  • Vassa kollegor som gillar att lära och läras av varandra
  • Konkurrenskraftiga förmåner
  • Inkluderande och hållbar arbetsmiljö

Title: Senior ML Engineer
Description:
Hej, Truecaller is calling you from Stockholm, Sweden! Ready to pick up?




Our goal is to make communication smarter, safer, and more efficient, all while building trust everywhere. We're all about bringing you smart services with a big social impact, keeping you safe from fraud, harassment, scam calls or messages, so you can focus on the conversations that matter.




Top 20 most downloaded apps globally, and world’s #1 caller ID and spam-blocking service for Android and iOS, with extensive AI capabilities, with more than 400 million active users per month.
Founded in 2009 with an impressive year-on-year growth with high profitability, listed on Nasdaq OMX Stockholm, Large Cap.
Founded in 2009, listed on Nasdaq OMX Stockholm and is categorised as a Large Cap. Our focus on innovation, operational excellence, sustainable growth, and collaboration has resulted in consistently high profitability and strong EBITDA margins.
A team of 400 people from ~35 different nationalities spread across our headquarters in Stockholm and offices in Bangalore, Mumbai, Gurgaon and Tel Aviv with high ambitions.




We, at the Data Science and Analytics Products team, build centralised data products that serve the business and our customers. We collaborate across all of Truecaller, delivering products that require centralised ownership or where the competence to build the products is not present in the wider product organisation.




As a Senior ML Engineer, you will be working hands-on to optimise training and deployment of ML models to be quick and cost-efficient. You will also be at the forefront of putting our ML models on mobile devices to enhance data privacy and customer experience. To achieve this you will need to collaborate with teams across Truecaller to establish best practices and tools for efficient ML model development and deployment, particularly on mobile platforms. You will be expected to help Truecaller reach and stay at the cutting edge of ML training and deployment, as well as explore new frontiers such as federated learning.




The impact you will create:




Understand the current and future needs of developers and the organisation, and create a roadmap with your manager for meeting those needs.
Work with teams throughout Truecaller, enabling them to put models into production quickly and cost-effectively.
Work hands-on with teams throughout Truecaller to optimise ML models for mobile devices.
Be the go-to expert for developing models for mobile devices as well as deploying them.
Staying up to date with the latest trends and technologies in ML Engineering, especially ML on mobile phones, and driving continuous innovation throughout Truecaller.




What you bring in:




5+ years of experience in machine learning engineering, with a focus on deploying ML models in production environments.
Hands-on experience deploying ML models on mobile devices (e.g., TensorFlow Lite, Core ML, ONNX Runtime Mobile).
Strong understanding of machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, ONNX) and their deployment on mobile platforms.
Understanding of both Android and iOS development and how that impacts ML model deployment and usage.
Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively across different teams and disciplines.
A customer-focused mindset.
Excellent communication skills in spoken and written English.




It would be great if you also have:




Hands-on experience developing ML models.







Life at Truecaller - Behind the code: https://www.instagram.com/lifeattruecaller/




Sounds like your dream job?




We will fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate, so please send your application as soon as possible. As part of the recruitment process, we will conduct a background check.

This position is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

We only accept applications in English.




What we offer:




A smart, talented, and agile team: An international team where ~35 nationalities are working together in several locations and time zones with a learning, sharing, and fun environment.
A great compensation package: Competitive salary, 30 days of paid vacation, flexible working hours, private health insurance, parental leave top-up, pension contribution, Udemy membership to keep learning and improving, and free gym membership.
Great tech tools: Pick the computer and phone you most fancy within our budget ranges.
Do it your way: We work in the office on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays with flexibility on the other days.
Office life: Enjoy your days with a wide range of yummy snacks and beverages, and have fun in our playroom! As well as in our exciting company parties and team activities such as Lab days, Running team, and Geek lunch!




Come as you are:




Truecaller is diverse, equal, and inclusive. We need a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs, and experiences to keep building our great products. No matter where you are based, which language you speak, your accent, race, religion, color, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, etc. All those things make you who you are, and that’s why we would love to meet you.

Title: AI/ML Engineer inom Analytics
Description:
Brinner du för artificiell intelligens och maskininlärning? Är du på jakt efter det där avgörande steget som kommer att lyfta din karriär till nya höjder? Då har du hittat rätt!

Hos Avega Data & Analytics letar vi efter just dig – en dedikerad AI/ML-engineer, full av driv och redo att omvandla din tekniska skicklighet till revolutionerande lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad. Missa inte chansen att bli en del av vårt härliga team och forma framtiden med oss!




Vad vi erbjuder:

Vårt mål är att vara den mest utvecklande arbetsplatsen i din karriär. Vårt unika forum för kompetensutveckling – Elevate – har över 70 föreläsningar och workshops om året. Utöver Elevate delar vi kunskap kontinuerligt t ex genom Lunch’n’Learn, ML Hackatons och ett AI labb.




Vår matchningsprincip 1:1 innebär att vi alltid strävar efter 100% matchning mellan våra kompetenser och våra kunders utmaningar – vi är aktivt med och väljer våra konsultuppdrag för att uppnå kontinuerlig utveckling och engagemang. För oss är rätt utmaning för varje individ avgörande för att lyckas i rollen.




Vi återfinns i de flesta branscher i den svenska arbetsmarknaden, och vi väljer gärna kunder och uppdrag som både utvecklar oss som konsulter och som gynnar samhället i stort.




På Avega delar vi generöst med oss av vår kunskap och är alltid redo att lära av varandra, i en atmosfär präglad av ömsesidig respekt och prestigelöshet. Det skapar en familjär och uppmuntrande arbetsmiljö för alla.







Dina kvalifikationer

Teknisk expertis: Starka kunskaper i AI och machine learning-tekniker, inklusive algoritmer, modellering och dataanalys.
Programmering och verktyg: Behärskar programmeringsspråk som Python mycket väl, samt god kunskap om AI-ramverk som TensorFlow eller PyTorch. Arbetserfarenhet av Azure ML, AWS ML och/eller Google Cloud AutoML.
Datahantering: Förmåga att extrahera, rengöra och hantera stora datamängder med verktyg som SQL och Pandas.
Etik och dataskydd: God förståelse för etiska överväganden och dataskyddsregler relaterade till AI-applikationer.
Språk: Goda kunskap i svenska och engelska – både i tal och skrift.




Utöver de mer tekniska kvalifikationerna lägger vi även stor vikt vid följande kompetenser:




Problemidentifiering och lösning: Skicklighet i att identifiera affärsproblem som kan lösas med AI och utveckla skräddarsydda lösningar.
Kommunikation och presentation: Starka förmågor i att kommunicera tekniska koncept till icke-tekniska stakeholders och att presentera lösningar och framsteg effektivt.
Affärsförståelse: Insikt i hur AI kan skapa värde och driva innovation inom olika affärsområden.




Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din Analytics-karriär och göra en verklig skillnad med dina färdigheter inom AI/ML?




Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig och utforska hur du kan bidra till vårt team!

Show more

Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din Analytics-karriär och göra en verklig skillnad med dina färdigheter inom AI/ML?


Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig och utforska hur du kan bidra till vårt team!

Title: Data Scientist to a startup within mobile games
Description:
Our client is a Mobile Games studio in Stockholm, and is looking for an experienced Data Scientist who likes to tinker with data engineering and analytics.




Responsibilities:




Develop and Manage Databases: Design and maintain databases and data warehouses, ensuring efficient storage, retrieval, and data integrity.
Performance Optimization: Optimize database performance through indexing, query optimization, and regular maintenance.
Data Cleaning and Preprocessing: Clean and preprocess raw data to ensure quality and suitability for analysis, effectively handling missing data, outliers, and other data quality issues.
Model Performance Monitoring: Continuously monitor model performance, making necessary adjustments to maintain accuracy and relevance over time.
Data Visualization: Create compelling data visualizations and dashboards to present data insights clearly and effectively.
Communication of Complex Data: Use visualization tools to facilitate the understanding and communication of complex data.
Data Analysis: Analyze large datasets to extract actionable insights, identifying trends, patterns, and correlations that inform strategic decisions.




About You

We believe you have a background in data engineering and analytics within the gaming industry and have a passion for mobile games.




Requirements:




SQL Proficiency: Expert in SQL for querying and managing relational databases.
Google BigQuery Expertise: Experienced in using Google BigQuery for data warehousing, including understanding its SQL dialect and optimization techniques.
Scalable Database Solutions: Knowledgeable in creating distributed and scalable database solutions.
ETL Pipelines: Experienced in developing and managing ETL pipelines for data ingestion, processing, and transformation.
Statistical Analysis and Data Mining: Skilled in statistical analysis and data mining techniques to uncover insights from large datasets.
Dashboard Development: Proficient in building dashboards and supporting self-sufficient data models.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Experience working in cross-functional teams, providing data insights to support product improvements.




Their office is located in central Stockholm, and they all work on-site. They are looking for someone who wants to do the same.

Title: SW Developer for ML/Computer Vision - Lund
Description:
Job Description

In Lund we work with the research and development of advanced sensor technologies and systems in small creative teams. In this assignment the candidate will be responsible for SW systems development in Linux environment in a project concerning advanced visual sensing using RGB cameras.

Our R&D development includes both algorithm and systems development for calibration, detection, tracking, 3D reconstruction and action recognition functions, utilizing multi-view camera approaches, and providing these to industrial and entertainment experiences etc.

You will work together with our ML/computer vision experts and influence the design and function of real-world solutions in exciting new application domains.

You Are

Self-motivated and proactive in taking part in the planning and design of software systems.

Used to working with Proof of Concepts, developing new applications and solving real world problems.

Expected Experience

Computer Vision systems development

Embedded Linux experience

Proficient in Python and C++

Strong problem-solving and debugging skills

Familiar with best practices in software architecture and API design

Familiar with performance optimization, CUDA

Good verbal and written communication skill

Other Relevant Experiences Include

Experience of end-to-end execution of machine learning projects

Familiarity with Nvidia Jetson environment

Familiarity with Git

Start: 2024-10-01 (or earlier)

Duration: 6 months

Workload: 100%

Location: Lund

Remote work: At least 3 days in office per week

Title: Data Scientist till ICA Gruppen
Description:
ICA Gruppen gör en stor satsning på Data Science och AI! Vår avdelning stöttar alla bolag inom gruppen genom att utveckla analytiska modeller och produkter, samtidigt som vi driver ICA Gruppens omvandling till en fullt datadriven organisation. Genom våra bolag – ICA Sverige, Apotek Hjärtat, ICA Banken, ICA Försäkringar, ICA Fastigheter och Rimi Baltic – har vi tillgång till stora mängder data. Detta ger oss otroliga möjligheter att skapa verkligt värde för både våra kunder och vår verksamhet genom att utnyttja kraften i banbrytande analys och innovation inom data science.

Är du redo att vara en del av vår resa?

Dina arbetsuppgifter

Som Data Scientist hos oss kommer du att arbeta i multidisciplinära team tillsammans med Data Engineers och verksamhetsexperter. Ni kommer att driva data science-case från idé till produktion inom hela ICA Gruppen. Du kommer att vara delaktig i att utveckla modeller och algoritmer inom ett brett område, och bidra till att utveckla data-drivna lösningar för affärsutmaningar.

Din roll kommer att innefatta hela data science-flödet, från insamling och bearbetning av data till modellering, visualisering och kommunikation av resultat till stakeholders. Du kommer också att arbeta med att sätta lösningar i produktion samt att experimentera med stora datamängder för att identifiera användbara signaler i data. Arbetet innefattar både snabb, utforskande utveckling och framtagning av strukturerad, skalbar kod för produktion.

Din profil

Vi söker dig som har ett stort intresse för att skapa affärsvärde med hjälp av data, maskininlärning och AI. Du har en universitetsexamen inom datateknik, statistik, matematik, fysik eller liknande, samt goda kunskaper i Python och SQL. Erfarenhet av att arbeta i molnmiljöer är en fördel, gärna i GCP som är vår primära utvecklingsmiljö.

Erfarenhet av agila arbetssätt samt moderna mjukvaruutvecklingskoncept som DevOps och CI/CD är meriterande, men viktigast är en vilja att lära och utvecklas. Du är analytisk, nyfiken och lösningsorienterad, och du har ett starkt eget driv. Förmåga att kommunicera tydligt och att anpassa tekniska insikter till affärsnytta är centralt för rollen.

Goda kunskaper i svenska språket är extra meriterande.

Kontaktinformation

Vid frågor gällande rekryteringsprocess, kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Bojana Mijocevic tel. 076 695 15 33. Vid frågor ang tjänsten, kontakta rekryterande chef, Ola Ottosson, 0733 91 88 33.

Sista dag för ansökan

Ansök så snart som möjligt, då vi gör löpande urval, men senast 2024-09-20.

ICA ska spegla våra kunder såväl som samhället i stort och är beroende av medarbetare med olika kompetenser. Vi strävar därför efter att anställa människor med olika bakgrund och värdesätter den kunskap och erfarenhet det medför.

ICA värnar om goda arbetsmiljöförhållanden för våra medarbetare. Vi har som målsättning att ha totalt rökfria arbetsplatser. Vi tillämpar drogtestning i samband med rekryteringsförfarandet. Är du nyfiken på oss och vill bli en av våra nya kollegor? Klart du är! Välkommen med din ansökan!

Välkommen med din ansökan!
Show more

Ni kommer att driva data science-case från idé till produktion inom hela ICA Gruppen. Du kommer att vara delaktig i att utveckla modeller och algoritmer inom ett brett område, och bidra till att utveckla data-drivna lösningar för affärsutmaningar.

Din roll kommer att innefatta hela data science-flödet, från insamling och bearbetning av data till modellering, visualisering och kommunikation av resultat till stakeholders. Du kommer också att arbeta med att sätta lösningar i produktion samt att experimentera med stora datamängder för att identifiera användbara signaler i data. Arbetet innefattar både snabb, utforskande utveckling och framtagning av strukturerad, skalbar kod för produktion.

Din profil

Vi söker dig som har ett stort intresse för att skapa affärsvärde med hjälp av data, maskininlärning och AI. Du har en universitetsexamen inom datateknik, statistik, matematik, fysik eller liknande, samt goda kunskaper i Python och SQL. Erfarenhet av att arbeta i molnmiljöer är en fördel, gärna i GCP som är vår primära utvecklingsmiljö.

Erfarenhet av agila arbetssätt samt moderna mjukvaruutvecklingskoncept som DevOps och CI/CD är meriterande, men viktigast är en vilja att lära och utvecklas. Du är analytisk, nyfiken och lösningsorienterad, och du har ett starkt eget driv. Förmåga att kommunicera tydligt och att anpassa tekniska insikter till affärsnytta är centralt för rollen.

Goda kunskaper i svenska språket är extra meriterande.

Kontaktinformation

Vid frågor gällande rekryteringsprocess, kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Bojana Mijocevic tel. 076 695 15 33. Vid frågor ang tjänsten, kontakta rekryterande chef, Ola Ottosson, 0733 91 88 33.

Sista dag för ansökan

Ansök så snart som möjligt, då vi gör löpande urval, men senast 2024-09-20.

ICA ska spegla våra kunder såväl som samhället i stort och är beroende av medarbetare med olika kompetenser. Vi strävar därför efter att anställa människor med olika bakgrund och värdesätter den kunskap och erfarenhet det medför.

ICA värnar om goda arbetsmiljöförhållanden för våra medarbetare. Vi har som målsättning att ha totalt rökfria arbetsplatser. Vi tillämpar drogtestning i samband med rekryteringsförfarandet. Är du nyfiken på oss och vill bli en av våra nya kollegor? Klart du är! Välkommen med din ansökan!

Välkommen med din ansökan!

Title: Machine Learning Engineer II
Description:
We in the Machine Learning product area in the Activation, Retention, Conversion studio are focused on building robust and scalable machine learning solutions that can personalize activation, retention and conversion funnels to improve important business metrics like SUBS and MAU. Through our messaging platform as well as other discovery & conversion surfaces, we communicate with users to connect them with valuable audio content and to help the business grow.

Our vision is to build the machine learning models and infrastructure that offers a fully personalized and ML-optimized experience for listeners throughout their user journey that powers every messaging and conversion campaign at Spotify.

This role sits in a squad called White Mouse that owns the optimization of plan upsell targeting across Spotify. Our key problem areas are: What plan should the user be upsold on discovery surfaces? How should we communicate the user on consideration surfaces? How should we balance upselling plans vs other paid products?

What You'll Do


Contribute to designing, building, evaluating, shipping, and refining Spotify’s product by hands-on ML development
Collaborate with a multi-functional agile team spanning user research, design, data science, product management, and engineering to build new product features that advance our mission to connect artists and fans in personalized and relevant ways
Prototype new approaches and productionize solutions at scale for our hundreds of millions of active users
Help drive optimisation, testing, and tooling to improve quality
Be part of an active group of machine learning practitioners in your mission and across Spotify


Who You Are


You have a strong background in machine learning, theory, and practice
You are comfortable explaining the intuition and assumptions behind ML concepts
You have hands-on experience implementing and maintaining production ML systems in Python, Scala, or similar languages
Experience with TensorFlow is also a plus
You are experienced with building data pipelines, and you are self-sufficient in getting the data you need to build and evaluate your models
You preferably have experience with cloud platforms like GCP or AWS
You care about agile software processes, data development, reliability, and focused experimentation
You have a desire to drive business impact


Where You'll Be


This role will be located in our London or Stockholm office


#JobSite-Sub-MachineLearning

Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer To Apoteas AI-Team | Stockholm
Description:
Position: Machine Learning Engineer & Senior Machine Learning Engineer

Location: Sveavägen 168, Stockholm, Sweden

Reports to: Chief AI Officer

Information: No relocation offer is able to be made




About Apotea

Join Apotea, Sweden's leading online pharmacy, with an annual revenue exceeding 6 billion SEK. We are building an AI team from the ground up and we are seeking passionate and driven individuals ready to leverage the power of AI and machine learning. If you're eager to make a significant impact and be part of a small technical team, we want to hear from you.




The AI Team

Innovative Environment: The AI organisation sits right under CEO Pär Svärdson, ensuring that your work has high visibility and significant influence.
High Impact: With over 50+ identified use cases, your contributions will drive meaningful change and innovation throughout Apotea.
Growth Opportunities: Play a pivotal role in shaping our AI strategy and enjoy ample opportunities for professional development, working across all stages of the ML lifecycle.




Your role as a Machine Learning Engineer at Apotea:

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritise AI use cases.
Develop and deploy machine learning models that solve real-world business problems.
Continuously improve and optimise AI solutions to enhance performance and scalability.
Contribute to the development of a robust AI infrastructure and best practices.
Foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning within the AI team.




What We’re Looking For

We’re seeking Machine Learning Engineers with diverse skills and a passion for solving complex problems. We are looking for three individuals with varying levels of experience, including senior, mid-level, and junior engineers. Ideal candidates will have experience building and deploying at least one AI application and have experience working across most stages of the ML lifecycle. We believe you have a broad skill set that includes most of the following skills:

Data Engineering: Ability to manage and preprocess large datasets, with a solid understanding of data pipelines and ETL processes.
Data Science: Experience with statistical modelling, data analysis, and algorithm development.
Software / ML Engineering: Proficiency in at least one major programming language such as Python or Java, and familiarity with ML frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
Cloud Computing: Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Azure).
Language Skills: Proficiency in English or Swedish is required.




Recruitment Process

Apply
Interview 1: Culture Fit
Interview 2: Technical Capabilities
Background Check: As a pharmacy, we always conduct a background check.
Offer Presented




Application

Do not hesitate to send in your application already today, we are working on appointing the entire new team as soon as possible. For more information or questions, visit our career page or contact us at jobb@apotea.se. We do not accept applications via email. Follow us on social media to stay updated on everything that happens at Apotea




LinkedIn

Instagram




Apotea is an inclusive employer that values diversity. We welcome all applicants and strive to create a work environment where people regardless of background, gender, age, religion or disability can thrive and develop.

Show more

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
Are you interested in contributing to the advancement of AI in mobile and web app development? Join us as an AI Engineer at Bontouch, where you'll play a key role in integrating Generative AI and Large Language Models into transformative applications for global brands. 🚀 This role involves developing and deploying scalable AI solutions that enhance functionality and user engagement. If you’re passionate about innovation in a collaborative setting and eager to continuously learn and grow, we invite you to help us shape the future of digital experiences. Together, let’s make a meaningful impact. ✨💪

BECOME A PART OF THE TEAM

At Bontouch, we work based on one simple but ambitious principle: to make the world’s greatest apps for the best brands on the planet. Currently, we work with partners such as Swish, PostNord, SJ, SEB, among many others, to build highly useful, beautiful-looking mobile and web apps that make life easier for millions of users in the real world.

During summer 2023, we joined forces with Denmark’s leading app agency Shape as well as Waterland Private Equity with the goal to create the leading digital product agency worldwide. This new venture is called Framna, and we want you to be part of our journey! 🚀

🏢 Joining our office in Stockholm, you will get to work in a cross-functional dedicated in-house team consisting of developers, designers, QA testers, analysts, and a product lead and team lead.

💼 Your day-to-day will include everything from leading AI research and model development, and deploying solutions at scale, to communicating, educating, and managing stakeholders and their expectations.

🌱 Finally, you also have the support of other AI enthusiasts with different backgrounds, such as data analysts, developers, and designers, who work on our AI projects to learn from one another, share experiences, develop new skill sets, and collaborate.

What You'll Do

As an AI Engineer with us, you’ll play a crucial role in pushing our AI initiatives forward, ensuring they're not just well-loved, but also tailored to our users’ needs. 🌟 If you're into dreaming up big AI ideas and getting your hands dirty coding and deploying them, you'll fit right in here.

More Specifically, In Your Role, You Will Be


Leading the exploration and application of LLMs and Generative AI, venturing into new areas within these fields, including multi-modal capabilities. You will be the go-to expert when creating new business opportunities, assisting sales, and pitching AI solutions to our partners.
Developing, testing, deploying, and evaluating AI models, focusing on scalability and efficiency.
Managing and improving data pipelines that are the backbone for training our AI models, making sure they perform at their best.
Collaborating in cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions and lead projects that enhance our AI capabilities.
Sharing what you learn and discover about AI with our internal teams and external partners. Your insights will help us all grow.
Taking the lead on internal projects using Generative AI to make our company smarter and more efficient, leveraging all the cool AI tools out there.
Keeping your finger on the pulse of the latest AI trends and breakthroughs, so we’re always ahead of the curve.


Who We Think You Are

Are you ready to make this role your own? 🙌 We believe you might feel at home with us if you have:


A Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields.
Hands-on work experience in AI, machine learning, LLMs, including prompt engineering, fine-tuning, RAG.
Experience with at least one of the cloud platforms, AWS, Azure, and GCP.
Strong programming skills in Python and experience with DevOps tools such as Kubernetes and Docker.
Familiarity with AI/ML frameworks (e.g. LangChain, LLM orchestration frameworks).
Experience with data engineering tools and platforms, and can handle large, complex datasets.
Great problem-solving and analytical skills, with an ability to work on complex projects and translate business challenges into AI/ML-driven solutions.
Strong communication skills with the ability to effectively convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, both internally and externally.
An adaptable and collaborative spirit, you thrive in a changing environment and enjoy working collaboratively with a team dedicated to innovation.


Benefits Of Working At Bontouch


A beautiful office in the heart of Stockholm, a hybrid-remote work setup, flexible working hours, as well as some other pretty neat benefits like a generous wellness grant, top-up on your parental leave, occupational pension, and much more. ✨
A culture of sharing. We have Friday demos, Wednesday lunch-and-learn, conceptathons, and Product Lead camps. We host an internal conference with all of our studios once a year – every time in a different part of the world. 🗺️
A flexible environment where you get to explore and create your role based on your passion.


Are you curious about our benefits and what it is like to work with us? Read about us here 👈

About Bontouch

At Bontouch, we work based on one simple but ambitious principle: to make the world’s greatest apps for the best brands on the planet. To have the greatest impact on users all over the world, we partner up with our favorite companies to create highly useful, beautiful-looking, visionary mobile and web apps that make life easier for millions of users in the real world. We work with partners such as Swish, PostNord, SJ, SEB, among many others. We offer our partners a unique long-term engagement model where we provide all the skills required for modern digital product development including strategy, design, development, testing, and maintenance.

What is the secret of our success? We are a team, we work together, learn from each other, and trust in each other. For us, collaboration, knowledge exchange, our diverse backgrounds, and shared passion for creating the best possible digital products are our winning combination. We work together in-house in our Bontouch studios to ensure that we deliver products of the highest quality with the end user in focus.

Bontouch is the leading app agency in Sweden and has together with leading agency in Denmark (Shape) joined forces with Waterland Private Equity in 2023 with a joint ambition to create the leading digital product agency worldwide. Today the group consists of more than 400 employees across offices in Copenhagen, Stockholm, Zurich, New York, London, Åre, Östersund and Kalmar. The group will continue to grow organically while pursuing international expansion through acquisitions of digital product agencies that have achieved a leading position in their respective markets by delivering best-in-class mobile apps.

HIRING PROCESS

🕵️ Psychometric assessment - Skills and Logical Reasoning test

👥 1st meeting with the Talent Acquisition Specialist

🎬 Technical challenge and case study presentation

🎯 Final meeting

Please note: For this role, you need to be based in Sweden and we are unfortunately not able to offer a relocation package.

We serve clients in North America, Europe and Asia from five studios in Sweden, London and New York. The products we help create are used by more than 50 million people in 195 countries. Read about our products at bontouch.com
Show more
